title: The Two worlds of Hong Kong
creator_credit: Dennis B. Kane and National Geographic Society
brief_description: Explores the clash between the cultures of the East and West as exemplified by the lives of two Hong Kong families. Shows how changing values can affect tradtional lifestyles and strain strong family ties. Also explores the street markets, the religious shrines, and Hong Kong’s busy harbour.
